content.description:
The question refers to the image shown.
© Gladstone Gallery, New York and Brussels

The work shown is Preying Mantra by Wangechi Mutu.
content.question: Which of the following statements accurately describes Mutu’s Preying Mantra and Cindy Sherman's Untitled (#228) from the History Portraits series?

choices.label: Both works incorporate autobiographical references to elicit empathy from viewers.
Both works have an aesthetic philosophy that values form over content.
Both works comment on the impact of European culture on cultures that were colonized.
Both works use design and content to question traditional cultural assumptions.

content.answer: Both works use design and content to question traditional cultural assumptions.

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain how two or more works of art are similar and/or different in how they convey meaning.
